history.proof: hauto use: Nat.add_assoc, rem_plus_rem, rem_erase, div_rem_spec1.

original: rewrite <- (rem_rem (a + b) p) at 2. rewrite Nat.add_mod_idemp_r with (n := p). rewrite Nat.add_mod_idemp_l with (n := p). rewrite rem_rem. rewrite rem_rem. repeat rewrite Nat.add_mod. reflexivity. apply Hp. apply Hp. apply Hp. apply Hp.
